Alert.Headline: UIC-Halsted Station Peoria Entrance Temporary Closure
Alert.ShortDescription: The Peoria entrance to UIC-Halsted is temporarily closed. Enter/exit the UIC-Halsted station thru the Halsted or Morgan entrances.
Alert.FullDescription:
How does this affect my trip?
The Peoria entrance to UIC-Halsted is temporarily closed.

To enter or exit UIC-Halsted station, use the Morgan entrance located 1/8 mile west of the Peoria entrance, at the west end of the station platform; or use the Halsted entrance located 1/8-mile east of the Peoria entrance, at the east end of the platform.

Why is service being changed?
The Peoria entrance to UIC-Halsted is being temporarily closed due to the closure of the Peoria Street overpass for reconstruction and renovation of the Peoria station house as part of the Illinois Department of Transportation’s Circle Interchange Project.

 

MAP

Alert.Headline: Clark/Division Station Platform Access
Alert.ShortDescription: Access to portions of the Clark/Division (Red Line) platform may sometimes be limited for people with disabilities due to construction.
Alert.FullDescription:
How does this affect my trip?
The new LaSalle entrance to the Clark/Division station is equipped with elevators. While construction to complete the renovation to the platform and Clark St. entrance continues, access to portions of the platform may sometimes be limited for people with disabilities—especially those using wheelchairs or other mobility devices.

To avoid construction areas and difficulty accessing the elevator:

  • When riding Howard-bound trains to Clark/Division, ride in the first car.
  • When riding 95th-bound trains to Clark/Division, ride in the last car.
     

When work is complete, the Clark/Division station will be accessible. See station personnel for further assistance.

Learn more about the project, here.

Why is service being changed?
We are performing station construction to renovate the Clark/Division station.

 

Related: Clark St. Entrance Temporary Closure for Construction

Alert.Headline: Temporary Bus Stop Relocation
Alert.ShortDescription: The EB #55 bus stop located on the SW corner of 55th/University will be temporarily relocated to the SE corner of 55th/University.
Alert.FullDescription:
How does this affect my trip?
The eastbound bus stop currently located on the southwest corner of 55th/University will be temporarily relocated to the southeast corner of 55th/University.

Why is service being changed?
The bus stop will be temporarily relocated due to construction.

Alert.Headline: Temporary Bus Stop Relocation
Alert.ShortDescription: NB #22 bus stop on the southeast corner at Clark/Waveland will be temporarily relocated to the northeast corner at Clark/Waveland.
Alert.FullDescription:
How does this affect my trip?
The northbound #22 bus stop on the southeast corner at Clark/Waveland will be temporarily relocated to the northeast corner at Clark/Waveland. 

Why is service being changed?
The bus stop is being relocated due to construction.

Alert.Headline: Temporary Bus Stop Elimination
Alert.ShortDescription: EB #15 and #172 bus stop on the SW corner at Hyde Park Blvd./Lake Park Ave. has been temporarily eliminated.
Alert.FullDescription:
How does this affect my trip?
The eastbound #15 Jeffery Local and #172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood bus stop on the southwest corner at Hyde Park Blvd./Lake Park Ave. has been temporarily eliminated.

Board/exit eastbound #15 and #172 buses one block west on the southwest corner at Hyde Park Blvd./Blackstone.

Why is service being changed?
The bus stop has been temporarily eliminated due to construction.

Alert.Headline: Temporary Bus Stop Relocation
Alert.ShortDescription: The southbound 56 stop on the northwest corner of Milwaukee/North Ave will be relocated a half-block northwest to 1630 N. Milwaukee.
Alert.FullDescription:
How does this affect my trip?
The southbound stop on the northwest corner of Milwaukee/North Ave will be relocated a half-block northwest to 1630 N. Milwaukee.

Why Service Is Being Changed?
The bus stop is being temporarily relocated due to construction on the corner of Milwaukee/North Ave.

Alert.Headline: Temporary Bus Stop Relocation
Alert.ShortDescription: The eastbound #63 stop on the southeast corner at 63rd/Stewart will be temporarily relocated to the southwest corner at 63rd/Stewart.
Alert.FullDescription:
How does this affect my trip?
The eastbound stop on the southeast corner at 63rd/Stewart will be temporarily relocated to the southwest corner at 63rd/Stewart.
 
Why is service being changed?

The bus stop is being relocated due to construction.

Alert.Headline: Bus Stop Eliminations/Relocations
Alert.ShortDescription: #8 Halsted bus stop eliminations/relocations at the intersections of Halsted/Huron, Halsted/Erie ,Halsted/Hubbard, Halsted/Lake.
Alert.FullDescription:
How does this affect my trip?
·         The northbound and southbound #8 bus stops located near the southeast and northwest corners of Halsted/Huron will be eliminated. Please board buses as follows:
 
–Board northbound buses on the northeast corner of Halsted/Grand
–Board southbound buses on the northwest corner of Halsted/Erie.
 
·         The southbound #8 bus stop located near the northwest corner of Halsted/Hubbard will be eliminated.
 
–Board southbound buses on the northwest corner at Grand/Halsted.

 
·         The southbound #8 bus stop on the southwest corner at Halsted/Erie will be relocated to the northwest corner at Halsted/Erie.

 
·         The southbound #8 bus stop on the northwest corner at Halsted/Lake will be relocated to southwest corner at Halsted/Lake.
      
Why is service being changed?

The bus stops are being relocated due to the installation of a bike lane on Halsted.

Alert.Headline: Bus Stop Relocation
Alert.ShortDescription: The eastbound #20 bus stop on the southwest corner at Madison/Springfield will be relocated to the southeast corner at Madison/Springfield.
Alert.FullDescription:
How does this affect my trip?
The eastbound #20 bus stop on the southwest corner at Madison/Springfield will be relocated to the southeast corner at Madison/Springfield.

Alert.Headline: Temporary Bus Stop Elimination
Alert.ShortDescription: The EB #N4, 19, 20, 56, 69, N66, 147, 151, 157 bus stop located near the SE corner at Washington/Wabash will be temporarily eliminated.
Alert.FullDescription:
How does this affect my trip?
The eastbound bus stop located near the southeast corner at Washington/Wabash will be temporarily eliminated.

Note: Eastbound #147 buses will be temporarily relocated to the existing eastbound bus stop located near the southeast corner at Washington/State.

Why is service being changed?
The bus stop is being temporarily eliminated due to utility work.

Alert.Headline: Temporary Bus Stop Relocation
Alert.ShortDescription: The WB #J14, 19, 20, 56, 60, 124, 157 bus stop located on the NE corner at Madison/Wabash will be temporarily relocated to the NW corner.
Alert.FullDescription:
How does this affect my trip?
The westbound bus stop located on the northeast corner at Madison/Wabash will be temporarily relocated to the northwest corner at Madison/Wabash.

Why is service being changed?
The bus stop is being temporarily eliminated due to utility work.

Alert.Headline: Temporary Reroute
Alert.ShortDescription:
EB #63 -via 63rd, Stewart, 65th, Wentworth, normal route on 63rd.
WB - via 63rd, Wentworth, 59th, Yale, normal route on 63rd
Alert.FullDescription:
How does this affect my trip? 
Eastbound buses will operate via 63rd, Stewart, 65th, and Wentworth, then resume their normal route on 63rd.
 
Westbound buses will operate via 63rd, Wentworth, 59th, and Yale, then resume their normal route on 63rd.
 
Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to bridge reconstruction on 63rd over the Dan Ryan expressway.

Alert.Headline: Temporary Bus Stop Relocation
Alert.ShortDescription: WB J14, 19, 20, 56, 60, 124, 157 bus stop on the NW corner at Madison/Wells temporarily relocated to NE corner at Madison/Franklin.
Alert.FullDescription:
How does this affect my trip?
The westbound bus stop on the northwest corner at Madison/Wells will be temporarily relocated to the northeast corner at Madison/Franklin.

Please board westbound #J14 Jeffery Jump, #19 United Center Express, #20 Madison, #60 Blue Island/26th, #124 Navy Pier, and #157 Streeterville/Taylor and northbound #56 Milwaukee buses one-half block west at Madison/Franklin. 

Why is service being changed?
The bus stop will be temporarily relocated due to construction.

Alert.Headline: Temporary Bus Stop Relocation
Alert.ShortDescription: EB #147 and #151 bus stop on the SE corner at Washington/Garland will be temporarily relocated to the SE corner at Washington/State.
Alert.FullDescription:
How does this affect my trip?
The eastbound #147 Outer Drive Express and #151 Sheridan bus stop on the southeast corner at Washington/Garland will be temporarily relocated to and consolidated with the existing bus stop on the southeast corner at Washington/State.

Why is service being changed?
The bus stop will be temporarily relocated due to construction at Washington/Garland.

Alert.Headline: Buses Resume Normal Routing
Alert.ShortDescription: #55 Garfield buses in both directions will return to their normal routing.
Alert.FullDescription:
How does this affect my trip?
Buses in both directions will return to their normal routing.  Buses will operate via 55th and Cicero rather than rerouting via Pulaski and 59th.

Why is service being changed?

Buses will return to their normal routing due to completion of construction at 55th/Keeler.

Alert.Headline: Bus Stop Relocation
Alert.ShortDescription: Board #21 Cermak buses in both directions in front of the new Cermak-McCormick Place (accessible) Green Line station.
Alert.FullDescription:
How does this affect my trip?
The eastbound #21 Cermak stops at the southwest corners of Cermak/State and Cermak/Wabash, and the westbound stop located at the northeast corner of Cermak/State, will be relocated midblock on Cermak between State and Wabash.
 
Board #21 Cermak buses in both directions in front of the new Cermak-McCormick Place (accessible) Green Line station.

Why is service being changed?
Bus stops are being relocated for the convenience of customers transferring between #21 Cermak buses and the Green Line at the new Cermak-McCormick Place station.

Alert.Headline: Weekend Service Added
Alert.ShortDescription: Weekend service will be added to the #39 Pershing route, operating Sat & Sun/hol btwn 8a-5:18p eastbound and 8:41a-6:01p westbound.
Alert.FullDescription:
How does this affect my trip?
Weekend service will be added to the #39 Pershing route. Buses will operate on weekends during the following hours (times leaving the terminal):

Saturdays & Sundays/Holidays:
38th/St. Louis east to 40th/Lake Park: 8:00am-5:18pm
40th/Lake Park west to 38th/St. Louis: 8:41am-6:01pm

Service will run approximately every 25-30 minutes.

Why is service being changed?
Weekend #39 bus service is being added as part of a 180-day experiment based on increased potential ridership demand.

Alert.Headline: New Cermak-McCormick Place Station Opens
Alert.ShortDescription: The new Cermak-McCormick Place station on the Green Line is open for service.
Alert.FullDescription:
How does this affect my trip?
The new Cermak-McCormick Place station on the Green Line will be open for service. This station will be accessible to customers with disabilities and include these customer convenient features:

  • Three entrances, for convenient access and bus transfers – a staffed main entrance on the north side of Cermak Road, an auxiliary farecard entrance on the south side of Cermak Road, and a staffed entrance at 23rd Street
  • Farecard vending machines at all three entrances
  • An island platform featuring full canopy coverage, heaters, and benches
  • Bright lighting and security cameras throughout the station
  • New signage, including digital displays, neighborhood maps and Braille
  • Bike racks at all three entrances
  • Convenient access to McCormick Place, Motor Row, and other Near South Side destinations

 

 

See also: Press release

Alert.Headline: Temporary Reroute
Alert.ShortDescription: #36 Broadway buses will operate in both directions via Broadway, Lawrence, Sheridan, Wilson, and Broadway.
Alert.FullDescription:
How does this affect my trip?
Buses will operate in both directions via Broadway, Lawrence, Sheridan, Wilson,
and Broadway.
 
Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to the Red Line Wilson Station Reconstruction project.

and Broadway.

Alert.Headline: #21 Cermak Buses to the Auto Show
Alert.ShortDescription: #21 Cermak service to the Auto Show approximately every 8 to 20 minutes during show times.
Alert.FullDescription:
#21 Cermak Buses to the Auto Show 
Service approximately every 8 to 20 minutes during show times.
 
Direct service to McCormick Place from the West Side:
Board buses eastbound on Cermak.

Alert.Headline: #3 King Drive Buses to the Auto Show
Alert.ShortDescription: #3 King Drive service to the Auto Show every 6 to 15 minutes during show times.
Alert.FullDescription:
#3 King Drive Buses to the Auto Show 
Service every 6 to 15 minutes during show times.
 
Direct Service to McCormick Place from the North:
Board buses southbound on Michigan Avenue (south of Chicago Avenue).
 
Direct Service to McCormick Place from the South:
Board buses northbound on King Drive.

Alert.Headline: Howard-bound Subway Trains Rerouted to Elevated Tracks
Alert.ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line subway trains are rerouted to the elevated tracks between Cermak-Chinatown and Fullerton.
Alert.FullDescription:
How does this affect my trip?

Howard-bound Red Line subway trains are rerouted to the elevated tracks between Cermak-Chinatown and Fullerton.

 

At Roosevelt station:

  • Board/exit Howard-bound trains on the Green/Orange lines elevated platform.
 

Downtown:

  • Board/exit Howard-bound trains at any Wabash or Lake Loop elevated station.
 

At Grand, Chicago, Clark/Division, and North/Clybourn stations:

  • For service to these stations, take a Howard-bound train to Fullerton and transfer to a 95th-bound train.
  • For service from these stations, take a 95th-bound train to Lake and transfer to a Howard-bound train.
 
Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
We are performing maintenance in the State Street subway and making improvements at the Clark/Division station.

*Entry/exit at Merchandise Mart station is via the Kinzie auxiliary entrance stairways, and requires a farecard (no vending machines), from 2am to 4am Saturday and 2am to 5am Sunday. ADA-accessible entry/exit not available during these times. 

 

Map

Alert.Headline: Boarding Change, Delays Between Grand and Cermak-Chinatown
Alert.ShortDescription: Red Line trains will operate on the same track between Grand and Cermak-Chinatown, resulting in boarding changes and minor delays.
Alert.FullDescription:
How does this affect my trip?
Board/exit all trains on the Howard-bound side of the platform at the Lake, Monroe, Jackson, Harrison, and Roosevelt stations.
 
Trains in both directions will operate on the same track between Grand and Cermak-Chinatown, resulting in minor delays.
 
Allow extra travel time.

 
Why is service being changed?
We are performing maintenance work to ensure that trains continue to operate safely along the Red Line.

Alert.Headline: Boarding Change, Delays Between Grand and LaSalle
Alert.ShortDescription: Blue LIne trains will operate on the same track between Grand and LaSalle, resulting in boarding changes and minor delays.
Alert.FullDescription:
How does this affect my trip?
Board/exit all trains on the O’Hare-bound side of the platform at the Clark/Lake, Washington, Monroe, and Jackson stations.

Trains in both directions will operate on the same track between Grand and LaSalle, resulting in minor delays.
 
Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
We are performing maintenance in the Dearborn Subway to ensure that trains continue to operate safely along the Blue Line.

Alert.Headline: Howard-bound Trains Bypass Addison Station
Alert.ShortDescription: Howard-bound trains will not stop at the Addison station.
Alert.FullDescription:
How does this affect my trip?
Howard-bound trains will not stop at the Addison station.

For service to Addison station, take a Howard-bound train to Sheridan and transfer to a 95th-bound train.

For service from Addison station, take a 95th-bound train to Belmont and transfer to a Howard-bound train.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
We are performing structural maintenance to ensure that trains continue to operate safely along the Red Line.

Alert.Headline: Boarding Change, Delays Between Armitage and Merchandise Mart
Alert.ShortDescription: Brown Line trains will operate on the same track between Armitage and Merchandise Mart, resulting in boarding changes and minor delays
Alert.FullDescription:
How does this affect my trip?
Board/exit all trains on the Kimball-bound platform at the Sedgwick and Chicago stations.

Trains in both directions will operate on the same track between Armitage and Merchandise Mart, resulting in minor delays.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
We are making structure improvements to remove slow zones and to improve rail service on the Brown line as part of the Ravenswood Connector Rehabilitation Project.

Alert.Headline: Temporary Reroute
Alert.ShortDescription: Eastbound #65 Grand buses will operate via Fullerton and Austin, then resume their normal route on Grand.
Alert.FullDescription:
How does this affect my trip? 
Eastbound buses will operate via Fullerton and Austin, then resume their normal route on Grand.
 
Westbound buses are not affected.
 
Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to sewer work at Grand/Mulligan.

Alert.Headline: Temporary Reroute
Alert.ShortDescription: Northbound #50 Damen buses will operate via Damen, 18th Street, Ashland, and Roosevelt, then resume their normal route on Damen.
Alert.FullDescription:
How does this affect my trip? 
Northbound buses will operate via Damen, 18th Street, Ashland, and Roosevelt, then resume their normal route on Damen.
 
Southbound buses are not affected.
 
Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to sewer work at 1229 S. Damen.

Alert.Headline: Temporary Reroute
Alert.ShortDescription: Trips to/frm Cicero/Archer: #47 both directions via 47th, Calif, 51st, Kedzie, Kedzie Orng Ln stn, Kedzie, 47th, Archer, Pulaski, 47th.
Alert.FullDescription:
How does this affect my trip? 
Trips ending at Kedzie Orange Line station:  Westbound buses will operate via 47th, California. 51st, and Kedzie, ending at  the Kedzie Orange Line station.
 
Eastbound buses are not affected.
 
Trips to/from Cicero/Archer: Buses will operate in both directions via 47th, California, 51st, Kedzie, Kedzie Orange Line station, Kedzie, 47th, Archer, Pulaski, and 47th.
 
Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to sewer work on 47th between Kedzie and Harding.

Alert.Headline: Temporary Reroute
Alert.ShortDescription: #47 buses will operate in both directions via 47th, California, 51st, Kedzie, and the Kedzie Orange Line Terminal, Kedzie, and 47th.
Alert.FullDescription:
How does this affect my trip?
Buses will operate in both directions via 47th, California, 51st, Kedzie, and the Kedzie Orange Line Terminal, Kedzie, and 47th.
 
Allow extra travel time.
 
Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to sewer construction at 47th/Kedzie

Alert.Headline: Temporary Bus Stop Relocation
Alert.ShortDescription: The SB bus stop on located on the NW corner at Harlem/Talcott will be temporarily relocated to the SW corner at Harlem/Talcott.
Alert.FullDescription:
How does this affect my trip?
The southbound bus stop on located on the northwest corner at Harlem/Talcott will be temporarily relocated to the southwest corner at Harlem/Talcott.

Why is service being changed?
The bus stop is being temporarily relocated due to construction.

Alert.Headline: Southbound #15 Jeffery Local and #J14 Jeffery Jump Temporary Reroute Ends
Alert.ShortDescription: The temporary reroute of Southbound 15 Jeffery Local and J14 Jeffery Jump buses near 94th/Jeffery has ended.
Alert.FullDescription:
The temporary reroute of Southbound #15 Jeffery Local and #J14 Jeffery Jump buses near 94th/Jeffery has ended.

Buses were temporarily rerouted, due to street blockage.

Alert.Headline: Brown and Red Line Delays
Alert.ShortDescription: Some Brown and Red Line trains are operating with residual delays after an earlier minor fire at track level near Sedgwick.
Alert.FullDescription:
Some Brown and Red Line trains are operating with residual delays after an earlier minor fire at track level near Sedgwick. Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
